Key Match Events: Che Adams helped to scramble in an equaliser in the 95th minute
VAR ruled out Che Adams' last-gasp goal for offside
Ryan Christie scored for Scotland in the 33rd minute
Igor Matanovic equalised for Croatia three minutes after Christie's goal
Andrej Kramaric headed Croatia in front in the 70th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke says 'disappointment is massive' as Scotland denied at the death
Scotland have lost all three of their games in the competition
Scotland has a winless run of nine games
Scotland have lost four consecutive games for the first time since October 2019
Scotland deserved at least a point but left with none
Scotland seemed to lack the required quality in the final third and fell asleep for the goals they conceded
